message.body: What r u doing? I'm working on a project but I'm only going out if I get to see u

Hi Sophie!!!! I'm actually home reading, in exhausted! I've been thinking about you though. What are you doing tomorrow during the day? There is a honk/ horn festival in Cambridge. I'm gong with a boy I met at Zuzu's last night, he's meeting up with a crew of people, we are Clifton dance the day away. Interested at all?
Ahhh I have to Much work to do day stuff this weekend! Dan
Awww no, that sucks! Maybe tomorrow night dancing also?
I shouldn't be going, but I had fun with his guy, so I'm going to push everything else aside.... I would love to see you tomorrow night.
Do you eat me to come into Boston tonight? I was planning in staying in, but can hang if you want.
Oh no it's cool
I'm overloaded with work
I might stay in
If you want to read together I wouldn't mind meeting up
But I have another couple of hours of work
Maybe we save doing work together for Sunday night? Are you going out tomorrow night?
I'm going to this party in Brighton want to come it should be really fun... Clive was invited (though he's not going, he posted on the event wall ) so maybe nick ?

aaaaah, shit, no fair! I'll be hanging out with this guy tomorrow during the day into early evening, it will be hard to ditch him, and I certainly won't be walking in with a guy in hopes of seeing Nick, Damn!!!
Aaaah Nick...
What's his last name I'll check
Aw I don't think he as invited
Is he Irish too?
Hahahha no, from mass
Let's make out with Irish men together
Hehehe ok! I like Clive, I think he's great. I want U2 to make out!
I just Facebook stalked the guy I'm hanging out with tomorrow.... Thank you Donald for making your albums public, it brings me much enjoyment scanning through your pictures.
Hahahaha
I friended Clive. He's hotter on Facebook than in real life
Old McDonald...
Yaaaay!!! Hehehaja heheh!
What, how is that a question, I ALWAYS need to go thrifting!!
Cait, you don't need to go thrifting do you?
Just saying, maybe you and I should get up the guts to message our massart crushes
The guy I'm hanging out with tomorrow has an Irish look to him, it's funny when you said lets make out with Irish boys because I think I will. If only you and Clive could hang out tomorrow 2...
I need to go thrifting for school.., I need supplied and stuff but I don't know where to go?
Haga
Yes we should
No we can be alter
Be slyer
We can come up with a plan
Tonight would have been good
Aww I just got home
Tonight would have been good, we do need to come up with a plan. I have clive's number... Just saying, maybe next weekend we can see what he and a bunch others are doing for the weekend.
Home sweet home!!
I don't know where to go thrifting either, but would be happy to figure it out and explore.
I'm still thinking a Halloween party at my place, and if not Halloween, the week after. My roomies are going to Hawaii for 10 days for a week after Halloween, party for all when that happens!
I'll look it up
Oh wonderful let's make it work
With Clive and mick
Nick
Lets have massart hookups
Hehe yes!!! Clive and Mick sounds like the name of a pop-star group. When we go on our first double date with them, we can tell them ;)
Hehehe!!! So jealous, that looks amazing!!!! We can make the boys popcorn, that's how we can steel their hearts!! You stole mine with the picture :)
Oh yeAh popcorn and wine
And in sitting with a puppy watching 8 mile I'm officially a spinster

Puppppppppy!!!! You guys have a puppy?!?! Hahaha, I'm in bed ready a book, listening to all of the people walking by outside going to the bars. Hahha you are not a spinster! We're planning how to get our lovers!!!
Haha. We are dog sitting for a week. He's really. Yet
Not yet cute
Heehe picture please!!
Awwwwwww puppy!!!!!!!!
How's your day going
Good, I'm a honk fest in Cambridge, with college friends, haven't even met up with said guy yet, cooooome!!! There will be music here all night!!!
I see nick
Aaaaah no fair!!!!
He's adorable. He'd working on a comp on the 3rd floor....
U best make that boy yours
I can't wait for us to get all foxy on massart grad students
Hehehe, me2,... He is adorable, I want him!!!!
Git me that smart Irish boy
I love Irish men... He'd be the third
Waaaa!!!! Hehehe just saw text!!!!!
